import React, { Component } from 'react' import EventService from '../../../service/events.service' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import './EventDetails.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class EventDetails extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { eventData: null } this.eventService = new EventService() } getEventInfo() { const id = this.props.match.params.eventId this.eventService.getEvent(id) .then(response => this.setState({ eventData: response })) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } componentDidMount = () => { this.getEventInfo() } render() { const { title } = this.state.eventData console.log("HOLA", title) return (

{this.state.title}

Volver

Detalles

Autor: {this.state.author}

Descripción: {this.state.description}

Dirección: {this.state.location}

Participantes: {this.state.attendance}

Fecha: {this.state.gameTime}

Hora: {this.state.gameHour}

Reseñas: {this.state.reviews}

) } } export default EventDetails
